item.title: Why dispassion is so important?
item.description: [[Radhika Nagpal]] 不认为要有更多的勇气去做，而是本应该去做。It’s a dispassion. 相反，要降低奖励，使得风险变低。 “Congratulations. Now you can do all the things you’ve always wanted to, take risk, take an easier pace, and have fun”. My answer was: “I’ve always done what I wanted to”. And its true. ^^But its not because I have extra courage. Rather, by demoting the prize, the risk becomes less.^^ People will say: you can do xyz after you get tenure. But if I am not here for tenure, then that doesn’t apply!

item.title: Are you in Beemind?
item.description: The obeservation of the numerous misfortunes that attend all conditions forbids us to grow insolent upon our perent enjoyments, or to admire a man’s happiness that may yet, in course of time, suffer change. For the uncertain furture has yet to come, with all variety of future; and him only to whom the divinity has continued happiness until the end we may call happy. Recently, I deployed two goals on the BEEMINDER to motivate myself about two things: 1) sleep on time 2)wake up on time.
